src:
Óleo chega a Mucuri, divisa entre Bahia e Espírito Santo

06 Nov 2019, 10:29

O óleo que atinge o litoral Nordeste chegou a Mucuri, município baiano que faz divisa com o Espírito Santo.
Segundo a Defesa Civil de Mucuri, fragmentos da substância são recolhidos na praia de Costa do Atlântico desde o início da semana.
text:
Oil arrives in Mucuri, border between Bahia and Espírito Santo

Nov 06 2019, 10:29

The oil that reaches the Northeast coast has reached Mucuri, a municipality in Bahia that borders the Espírito Santo.
According to the Mucuri Civil Defense, fragments of the substance have been collected on the Atlantic Coast beach since the beginning of the week.
